entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @HillaryClinton The #coronavirus was spreading all during impeachment .You supported impeaching President Trump .While yall were frittering away precious preparatory time, this useless endeavor cost us plenty . @AdamSchiff did something terrible at Chateau Marmont and Anthony Bourdain knew it.
